text: Kirdi Nidhi Bista () (15 January 1927 â€“ 11 November 2017) was a Nepalese politician. He was born in Thamel, Kathmandu, Nepal in 1927. He served as prime minister of Nepal from 1969 to 1970, 1971 to 1973 and 1977 to 1979. Bista died on 11 November 2017 of prostate cancer in Gyaneshwar, Kathmandu, Nepal at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Nepal Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Prime ministers of Nepal Category:People from Kathmandu Category:Nepalese Hindus
title: Kirti Nidhi Bista
